ModMetaData.name: Caravan Food Policies
ModMetaData.author: Aeroux
ModMetaData.description: Adds the ability to set caravan food policies for pawns. Pawns will automatically switch to their caravan food policy when leaving on a caravan and revert back to their original food policy when returning. Features: - Manage caravan food policies in the Assign menu. - Existing food policies can be used as caravan food policies. - Pawns will automatically have their food policy set to their caravan food policy immediately after departing home on a caravan. - Pawns will automatically have their food policy reverted back to its original value immediately after arriving home. - When forming a caravan and automatically select travel supplies is checked, food will be selected based on the caravan food policies of the pawns in the caravan.
